entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
